an4.57:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava koliyesu viharati pajjanikam nama koliyanam nigamo.
an4.57:1.2: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena suppavasaya koliyadhituya nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
an4.57:1.3: Atha kho suppavasa koliyadhita bhagavantam panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappesi sampavaresi.
an4.57:1.4: Atha kho suppavasa koliyadhita bhagavantam bhuttavim onitapattapanim ekamantam nisidi.
an4.57:1.5: Ekamantam nisinnam kho suppavasam koliyadhitaram bhagava etadavoca:
an4.57:2.1: “Bhojanam, suppavase, denti ariyasavika patiggahakanam cattari thanani deti.
an4.57:2.3: Ayum deti, vannam deti, sukham deti, balam deti.
an4.57:2.4: Ayum kho pana datva ayussa bhagini hoti dibbassa va manusassa va.
an4.57:2.5: Vannam datva vannassa bhagini hoti dibbassa va manusassa va.
an4.57:2.6: Sukham datva sukhassa bhagini hoti dibbassa va manusassa va.
an4.57:2.7: Balam datva balassa bhagini hoti dibbassa va manusassa va.
an4.57:2.8: Bhojanam, suppavase, denti ariyasavika patiggahakanam imani cattari thanani detiti.
